ruling: - [[Blue Thunder T-45]]'s effect activates at the end of the Damage Step, when monsters that are destroyed by battle are sent to the Graveyard. If the monster destroyed in battle by [[Blue Thunder T-45]] is removed from play by [[Dimensional Fissure]], etc., [[Blue Thunder T-45]]'s effect still activates.
- If [[Blue Thunder T-45]] is destroyed by a card effect after damage calculation, its effect still activates.
- Even while [[Skill Drain]] is active, the "Thunder Option Token" cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.
